Introduction: Hello, I am Aurelia. Nice to meet you.
divorced: I cannot believe that you would do such thing to me, knowing what I have been through. I resent you, but it's not worth talking about. Good bye, @.
breakUp: ...#$b#You probably thought I would beg you not to leave me, but no.#$b#You have made your choice and I accept it.
dumped_Girls: I heard what you did. You are wasting your life away to break other people's hearts. Don't talk to me.
secondChance_Girls: @... Afterall, you have saved my life. I forgive you.
Mon: I am reading a book about human phsychology. It is a fascinating topic that I want to know more about.
Mon8: It's easy to forgive others once you have forgiven yourself.
Mon10: @, you never fail to brighten up my world.$l
Tue: Hello, how are you feeling today?$h
Tue8: At first, I was resentful... but now I decided to accept my past as it is.#$b#Afterall, the world is still beautiful.$h
Tue10: I wonder what it would be like to have a nice, warm, normal... family.#$b#The thought of a happy family sounds foreign, but I am not scared to live my life anymore.$h
Wed: Oh, dear. Look at me! I forgot to return a book! I hope Gunther won't get too mad.$h
Wed8: @, you wonderful person!$h#$b#That was a compliment, you see.$h
Wed10: Hmm, should I tell you a secret?$h#$b#The rabbit I followed that day was a green witch. I think she lives somewhere nearby.$h#$b#I saw her fly over your farm few weeks ago.
Thu: Appreciate the small things, @. I am just thrilled to be here today.$h
Thu8: What a wonderful day, don't you think? Well, no, I am not talking about the weather.$h#$b#I am just glad to be here today with you.$h
Thu10: @, I have been waiting to see you! My day without you is just a little bit too quiet.$l
Fri: Hello, what are you up to? I have been reading an amazing book. I will tell you all about it later.$h
Fri8: What a lovely day. A perfect day to read a good book.$h
Fri10: Hello, dear. Came all they way here to see me? Well, that's nice of you.$l
Sat: I love to learn new things. It's fascinating.$h
Sat8: Come by my house whenever you need to. I would love to help you out.$h
Sat10: You have been so good to me, @. I am so thankful for you.$l
Sun8: I don't know about you, but I like my hair short! It is so light and fluffy!$h
Sun10: @! I don't have nightmares these days. I rather dream about...$h#$b#Well, I'm not going to say. It's embarassing.$l
spring_Wed: I just love when the flowers bloom. It brightens up my day.$h
spring_Sat: Hello, @. I must say, I love spring. It feels magical.$h
summer_Mon: Summer is hot, but I kind of enjoy the heat. It feels like the sun is blessing me.$h
summer_Thu: People are very active around summer! Want to get icecream sometime?$h
summer_Fri: Hello, @! You are sweating so much! Here, take a drink. [348]
fall_Fri: Ooh, I love this sweet scent of fall.$h
fall_Sat: Eveyln made me a pumpkin soup last night. It was the greatest thing I have ever tasted in my life!$h
winter_Wed: I think it's getting a bit too cold.$s
winter_Sun: I don't like how cold it is, but at least there is snow!
give_flowersA: ...!#$b#Yes! I can't believe this is happening to me...!$l
give_flowersB: @...!#$b#You are the best thing that happened in my life! Yes!$l
give_pendant: I... I don't know what to say... But I know one thing for sure.#$b#I love you! I will prepare everything in three days.$l
stardrop_gift: You can't imagine how much you mean to me, @.$h#$b#You are light of my life. Here's a gift I got for you to show you how much I appreciate you.$l
reject_two_heartA: Sorry, I am not ready for that.
reject_two_heartB: Sorry, I am not looking into anything serious.
reject_four_heartA: Oh, @. Sorry... I don't think I can accept this.
reject_four_heartB: @, I am sorry but I do not feel they same way.
engageA: Aren't you engaged? Get out of here.$a
engageB: You are insane, @. No. You are engaged.$a
marriedA: Who do you think you are? You are married. Get that away from me.$a
marriedB: So is this how you treat your partner? You are disgusting. You are married.$a
refusal_no_heartsB: Sorry, I don't think I know you.
spring_12: First festival of the year! I am so excited for tomorrow!$h
spring_23: Are you going to dance tomorrow? Just wondering.$l
summer_10: I wonder what the mayor will think of the soup this year.$h
summer_28: Are you ready for the event that's happening tonight?$h
fall_15: So many good things are going to be presented tomorrow at the fair! I am excited!$h
fall_27: I.. think I might get a bit scared for tonight's festival.$s
winter_7: I am going to bulid the biggest snowman for thee Ice Festival tomorrow!$h
winter_24: I love the Winter Star Festival. It gives me a warm feeling inside.$l
event_poem1: Oh...? Okay then. There is no need to be rude.$a
event_poem2: Why are you talking like that? Are you jealous?$a
event_poem3: Great! Here is goes. Don't tease.$h#$b#I was sitting in a room all alone.#$b#I saw no daylight. I was in complete darkness.#$b#Until, a shining star knocked on the door.#$b#I was afraid, but hopeful.#$b#You are my shining star.#$b#You taught me the joy of life.#$b#You are the brightest shining star in my night sky.#$b#...#$b#%Aurelia quietly smiles at you.#$b#Did you... like that?$h
event_poem4: Alright then. If you say so.
Resort_Entering: Hello, it is nice to see you here.$h
Resort_Wander: I'm looking for some pretty shells.$h
Resort_Bar: Are you here for a drink too?
Resort: I love this place so much.$h
